nodes.text: Ister Paddie was a male human who was Senator in the Galactic Senate during the Separatist Crisis.
During the start of the Clone Wars in 22 BBY, Paddie supported the Military Creation Act and was a member of the Loyalist Committee.
He carried the regal airs of a noble and wore an ornate outfit from Halbara that consisted of golden robes whilst in the Senate.
Ister Paddie was played by William Clay in Attack of the Clones.

Paddie's ornate headdress is reminiscent of that worn by the Imperial dignitaries introduced in Return of the Jedi. This style also appears among concept sketches of Bespin citizens created for The Empire Strikes Back.
